tool_description: Search for Products and get Full Product Details live from all regional Amazon stores.
name: AmazonLive
title: AmazonLive

api_list.name: Traverse Browse Nodes
api_list.description:
Traverse the Browse Nodes tree using my node library of more than `50.000` Amazon Browse Nodes.

Returns the node with the following information:
- Node Name
- Node ID (Used for search)
- List of parent nodes
- List of direct children

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `us`

The location of the Browse Node
*Browse nodes are specific to one Amazon store location*

Supported locations:
`us` `de` `fr` `uk` `it` `es` `in`

optional_parameters.name: node
optional_parameters.description:
Node ID of the Node you want to retrieve.
*Leave empty for Root node*

api_list.name: Search for Products
api_list.description: Search for Products on Amazon using a query, the store location, page of search results and price filters.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query. *Empty query is not allowed in Amazon search*

optional_parameters.name: node
optional_parameters.description:
Browse Node IDs used to refine and improve search results
Node IDs should be comma-seperated: `15690151,2617942011`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `1`

Page of the search query. Uses Amazon pagination. 

Amount of `products per page` and `total products` are returned in request.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `us`

Amazon Store used for this search.

Tested stores:
`us`  `de`  `fr`

Untested but available:
`uk`  `es`  `it`  `ca`  `jp`  `in`
`au`  `mx`  `br`  `ae`  `nl`  `tr`
`sg`  `sa`  `se`  `pl`

optional_parameters.name: price_high
optional_parameters.description: Maximum price filter for Amazon search.

optional_parameters.name: price_low
optional_parameters.description: Minimum price filter for Amazon search.

api_list.name: Get Product Financial Info
api_list.description:
Get Financial Information about a product that contains the following:
- Weight Information
- Price
- Amazon Fees
- Calculated Profit

*Amazon Fees are not available for all products. If they are not available the calculated profit will be 100%.*

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description:
Search for a product using **one ** of the following:
- SKU
- title
- ISBN
- UPC
- EAN
- ASIN

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `DE`

Amazon Store used for this search.

Available locations:
`GB` `DE` `FR` `IT` `ES` `IN`
`AE` `TR` `SA` `NL` `SE` `PL`
 `EG` `BE`

api_list.name: Get Product Reviews
api_list.description: Get Reviews of Amazon product using the ASIN of the product and the location of the store.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description:
ASIN of the Amazon product.

ASINs are often bound to a single Amazon store location and not available in a different one.

optional_parameters.name: only_verified
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

Only show reviews with verified purchase.

optional_parameters.name: sort_by_recent
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `false`

Sort the reviews by `most recent` or `top reviews`

optional_parameters.name: filter_by_star
optional_parameters.description:
Default: *None*

Filter the reviews by stars or if the review should be `positive `or `critical`

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Search reviews based on a keyword.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Default `1`

The page of the reviews result

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description:
Default `10`
Min `1`
Max `20`

The amount of reviews you want to retrieve. Lower amount will result in slightly faster response.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `us`

Amazon Store used to query this product.

`us `*can currently only show page 1*

Tested stores:
`us`  `de`  `fr`  `uk`  `es`  `it`
`ca`  `jp`  `in`  `au`  `sg`  `sa`
`se`  `nl`  `ae`   `pl`  `br`

Untested but available:
`mx`  `tr`

api_list.name: Get Product Details
api_list.description: Get Details of Amazon product using the ASIN of the product and the location of the store.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description:
ASIN of the Amazon product.

ASINs are often bound to a single Amazon store location and not available in a different one.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `us`

Amazon Store used to query this product.

Tested stores:
`us`  `de`  `fr`

Untested but available:
`uk`  `es`  `it`  `ca`  `jp`  `in`
`au`  `mx`  `br`  `ae`  `nl`  `tr`
`sg`  `sa`  `se`  `pl`

api_list.name: Search Browse Nodes
api_list.description:
Search for Browse Nodes using my node library of more than `50.000` Amazon Browse Nodes.

Returns up to 10 Nodes that contain the following information:
- Node Name
- Node ID (Used for search)
- List of parent nodes

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query used to search for nodes.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `us`

The location of the Browse Node
*Browse nodes are specific to one Amazon store location*

Supported locations:
`us` `de` `fr` `uk` `it` `es` `in`

api_list.name: Get Product Details HTML
api_list.description: Get the Amazon product details HTML using the ASIN of the product and the location of the store.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description:
ASIN of the Amazon product.

ASINs are often bound to a single Amazon store location and not available in a different one.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
Default: `us`

Amazon Store used to query this product.

Tested stores:
`us`  `de`  `fr`

Untested but available:
`uk`  `es`  `it`  `ca`  `jp`  `in`
`au`  `mx`  `br`  `ae`  `nl`  `tr`
`sg`  `sa`  `se`  `pl`
